description: This file implements the core functions of a simple CLI shell object, including session management, command processing, signal handling, and user authentication for a telnet-based environment.

classes.name: PSCLI_SHELL_OBJECT
classes.description: Main shell object managing sessions, command parsing, and communication.

methods.name: BOOL ScliShoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hClientInfo)
methods.description: Determines if a connection should be accepted; currently always returns TRUE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoServe(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PVOID pCmd,ULONG ulCmdSize)
methods.description: Handles incoming telnet data, processing commands and managing session state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoSignal(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,ULONG ulTspSignal)
methods.description: Processes signals such as session creation, termination, or abort signals.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE ScliShoGetSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG SessionId)
methods.description: Retrieves or creates a session based on SessionId.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE ScliShoCreateSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG SessionId)
methods.description: Creates a new session with initial parameters, including command cache and ICE interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoRemoveSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSession)
methods.description: Removes a session, cleaning up resources and updating session list.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoStartUserAuth(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv)
methods.description: Starts user authentication process, prompting for username/password.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoProcessCmdData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PVOID pCmd,ULONG ulCmdLen)
methods.description: Processes raw command data received from the client, handling special characters and command input.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoRunCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv)
methods.description: Executes the current command in the session, handling login states and command buffer.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoProcessCmdChar(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,UCHAR ucChar,PUCHAR pEchoBuf,PULONG pulEchoSize)
methods.description: Handles individual character input, updating command buffer, and managing cursor position.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoCacheCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,PUCHAR pCmd)
methods.description: Caches a command into session command history.

methods.name: BOOL ScliShoIsCmdModified(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,PUCHAR pCmd)
methods.description: Checks if the given command differs from the cached commands to determine if it should be added.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoRunBuiltInCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,ULONG CmdCode)
methods.description: Runs a predefined built-in command based on command code.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoRunNonBuiltInCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PUCHAR pCmd)
methods.description: Runs a non built-in command, including validation, authorization, and asynchronous execution.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoValidateCmdArgs(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PUCHAR pCmd)
methods.description: Validates command syntax and arguments before execution.

methods.name: ULONG ScliShoGetCmdCode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pCmd)
methods.description: Determines command code based on input string.

methods.name: PUCHAR ScliShoGetPrevCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession)
methods.description: Retrieves previous command from session history for command recall.

methods.name: PUCHAR ScliShoGetNextCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession)
methods.description: Retrieves next command from session history for command recall.

methods.name: PUCHAR ScliShoGetFirstCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession)
methods.description: Retrieves the first command in the session history.

methods.name: PUCHAR ScliShoGetLastCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession)
methods.description: Retrieves the last command in the session history.

methods.name: ULONG ScliShoGetEscCmdCode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PUCHAR pCmd,ULONG ulCmdLen,PULONG pulEscCodeLen)
methods.description: Parses ESC sequences from telnet input to determine special key commands.

methods.name: ULONG ScliShoGetInputMode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession)
methods.description: Returns the current input mode for a session.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoRedrawTextBoxInput(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,ULONG ulCursorTBoxPos)
methods.description: Redraws textbox input on the terminal, handling masking if needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoMoveToTextBox(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv)
methods.description: Moves terminal cursor to the start of the textbox.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoDoAuth(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PULONG pulPerm,PBOOL pbPrivileged,PULONG pulTermPermission,PULONG pulIdleTimeout,PULONG pulLockoutTimeout)
methods.description: Performs user authentication using provided credentials.

methods.name: ULONG ScliShoGetNumActiveSessions(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the number of currently active sessions.

methods.name: ScliShoGetNumActiveSessions
methods.description: Retrieves the number of currently active CLI shell sessions, considering both session states and shell type.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliShoRunShellCmd(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PUCHAR pCmd)
methods.description: Executes a system shell command received from a client session, managing temporary files, system calls, and output redirection, and relaying command output back to the session.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS ScliPostUserAuth(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,ANSC_HANDLE hShellSession,ULONG TermPermission)
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: ScliShoDoAuth
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PULONG pulPerm,PBOOL pbPrivileged,PULONG pulTermPermission,PULONG pulIdleTimeout,PULONG pulLockoutTimeout)

ctags.name: ScliShoGetEscCmdCode
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,PUCHAR pCmd,ULONG ulCmdLen,PULONG pulEscCodeLen)

ctags.name: ScliShoProcessCmdChar
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSrvSession,ANSC_HANDLE hExecEnv,UCHAR ucChar,PUCHAR pEchoBuf,PULONG pulEchoSize)
